messages.content: ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler is a custom node repository for ComfyUI that adds TCDScheduler, SamplerTCD Euler A, and SamplerTCD nodes to the Custom Sampler category, implementing Zheng et al.'s Trajectory Consistency Distillation.
How can I start using ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler in ComfyUI?
To start using ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler in ComfyUI, clone the repository into your custom_nodes folder and restart ComfyUI.
What is the current status of the SamplerTCD node in ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler?
Currently, SamplerTCD is a work in progress (WIP) and operates as DDIM with no gamma parameter. It is recommended to use SamplerTCD Euler A for the time being.
What is the special parameter of LCMScheduler in ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler?

The special parameter of LCMScheduler is gamma, which is used to control the stochasticity in every step. When gamma = 0, it represents deterministic sampling, whereas gamma = 1 indicates full stochastic sampling.
What is the default value of the gamma parameter in LCMScheduler?
The default value of the gamma parameter in LCMScheduler is 0.3. However, it is recommended to use a higher value when increasing the number of inference steps.
Who has helped with converting from sigmas to timestep and SamplerTCDEulerA in ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler?
Thanks are given to @laksjdjf for their help with converting from sigmas to timestep and SamplerTCDEulerA in ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler.
Where can I learn more about samplers and schedulers related to ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler?
For those curious about learning more about samplers and schedulers, an article is recommended: https://www.felixsanz.dev/articles/complete-guide-to-samplers-in-stable-diffusion
